originalText.text: Taking advantage of my daily wellness routine with my daily walk in the park and had to thank Lauren's Acheloa Wellness program. I've been able to supplement my lifestyle to improve my overall levels of stress, better by overall digestion, and support a complete mental and physical health regime. The plan was super accessible and easy to follow and each session brought tangible results to my overall well-being. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Working with Lauren has helped me understand the emotions I have as a working mom more clearly, and she's given me several invaluable, practical tools that I incorporate into daily life to make things more manageable and feel more positive overall. Highly recommend working with Lauren!

text.text: Working with Lauren has helped me understand the emotions I have as a working mom more clearly, and she's given me several invaluable, practical tools that I incorporate into daily life to make things more manageable and feel more positive overall. Highly recommend working with Lauren!

originalText.text:
I recently completed a program with Lauren and I highly recommend her. I was working on overdrive building my business and feeling burned out which I never thought was possible (since I love what I do.)

Working with Lauren helped me Identify all the places that I was sacrificing my basic needs/health (like eating and sleeping) to "get more done" which was not sustainable.

Working with her helped me learn to integrate routines for self care with the rest of my life which also helped me create better boundaries, and manage my time and energy in a new way.

Lauren's program also helped me really ingrain these new practices, so now I feel like I have the tools I learned at my disposal any time I need them. I also continue to find that I'm learning how to integrate these new principles from our work together long after the program has ended. Thank you so much Lauren!

originalText.text:
Lauren is such a gifted practitioner. I received and Ayurvedic consultation from her and it really helped me to get more in tune with my body, mind and spirit.
Lauren has the ability to pair her knowledge with intuition and from there she is guiding you into a deeper symbiosis with ones health and wellbeing.
She gives recommendations that are doable and it’s inspiring to see what shifts take place when you set realistic goals and don’t overwhelm the body. Lauren helps you to create a healthy relationship with your body and honors that nature is existing in every human being.
Thanks dear Lauren for your beautiful offering and guidance.

originalText.text: Lauren (founder of Acheloa Wellness) is a great resource for practical wellness and health advice.  I've been listening to her Wellness Wednesday series for months now and I love her approach.  She takes Ayurvedic principals and distills them into steps that are easy to implement and understand.  Her professional and personal experiences make her easy to relate to.  I've found that a lot of wellness resources out there are just fluffy ways to indulge yourself, but Lauren gives actual, concrete guidance to those looking to improve themselves and their well being.
